hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.
